dct_title_s: Map of the Israel campaign in the Sinai penisula X-XI. 1956 / published by Dr. J. Szapiro.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights. Map shows operations of the Israeli army - stages and dates, roads, railways, oil fields, oil pipelines, and oil refineries. Lower right corner shows illustration with caption: "...'and, behold, the bush burned with fire, and the bush was not consumed'! Ex, 3, 2." Shows operations of Israeli Army, including stages and dates, Suez Canal expedition of British and French forces, roads, railways, and oil infrastructure. Relief shown by shading. Second revised edition.
